Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Given its value and quality, I believe it's worth more than $100 to you. Considering its worth to both of us, I propose a price of $120 for the product. This offer includes not only the product itself but also a limited-time access to exclusive support and resources to help you make the most out of it. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
